description:
Get your cockpit dialled into proper torque spec with this compact torque wrench. With its 3-10nm range, this torque wrench is great for smaller components like stems, grips, brake/shifter clamps, seat posts, etc.

  • Includes: T25, #2 Phillips, and 3, 4, 5, 6mm Allen keys
  • Take standard ¼in. bits
  • Dimensions: 5 x 2.5 x 15cm
name: MEC Torque Wrench - Range 3nm-10nm
